plugins.name: Sticky Note Maker
plugins.description:
Sticky Note Maker

Effortlessly add colorful sticky notes to your Figma designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, and organizing ideas.


Key Features:

- Create sticky notes next to any selected frame (top-right) or centered in the viewport.

- Choose from 5 types: Note (blue), Fresh Idea (pink), Approved (green), Need Attention (yellow), Need Fix (red).

- Automatically includes your name and timestamp for easy tracking.

- Simple, icon-driven interface with color-coded hover and selection states.


How to Use:

1. Select a frame (or none for viewport placement).

2. Pick a sticky note type from the icon buttons.

3. Write your note and click "Create".


Ideal for designers, teams, and anyone who loves a visual way to comment and collaborate. Streamline your workflow with Sticky Note Maker!
plugins.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

140293.name: Sticky Note Maker
140293.description:

140293.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

plugins.name: QD - Magix - AI UX Writer - Text Generator
plugins.description:
Magix - AI Text Generator enables seamless text creation for your designs using OpenAI’s API.


After connecting the API, simply select the text elements (Text objects, Sticky notes or Shapes with text) you wish to generate. The plugin will automatically list them, allowing you to input custom prompts. With a single click on ‘Generate Content’ all selected text elements will be instantly generated and integrated into your design, streamlining your workflow.


AI Makes It Simple...
plugins.tagline: AI-Powered Text Generation - All Texts with One Click

122756.name: QD - Magix - AI UX Writer - Text Generator
122756.description:
Magix - AI Text Generator enables seamless text creation for your designs using OpenAI’s API.


After connecting the API, simply select the text elements (Text objects, Sticky notes or Shapes with text) you wish to generate. The plugin will automatically list them, allowing you to input custom prompts. With a single click on ‘Generate Content’ all selected text elements will be instantly generated and integrated into your design, streamlining your workflow.


AI Makes It Simple...

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires access to the OpenAI API to generate text. and moeinsaboohi to load header image.

122756.release_notes:
I’m constantly working to improve Magix for a better experience. If you have any suggestions or encounter any issues, feel free to share them! 😊

Version 3 Release Notes:
•  Improved UI and UX for a smoother experience
•  Fixed plugin issues in FigJam
•  Added text generation support for sticky notes and text-based shapes
•  Enhanced state message display
•  Resolved reported bugs
122756.tagline: AI-Powered Text Generation - All Texts with One Click

plugins.name: DATVM
plugins.description:
DATVM makes it simple to inject realistic and varied data directly into your Figma designs, saving you time and keeping your mockups authentic.


100+ Built-in Datasets

Choose from a wide range of pre-populated categories.


Customizable Lists

Create and manage your own custom lists to perfectly match your project's specific needs.


Sort & Randomize

Sort data alphabetically, by length, or randomize for unique content every time.


Number Formatting

Format numbers with precision. Control decimal places, separators, currency symbols, and percentage variations.


Date Formatting

Easily format dates with customizable separators and order.


Bookmarks

Save your favorite lists for quick and easy access.


How it Works

  1. Select the text layers you want to populate.
  2. Open DATVM.
  3. Choose a data category from the available lists or select a custom list.
  4. Customize formatting options.
  5. Click to populate the selected layers with data.
plugins.tagline: Finest Data Populator

122333.description:

plugins.name: Real Liquid Glass
plugins.description:
Bring that sleek iOS 26-style button glow into your Figma workflow with the Liquid Glass Effect plugin. It instantly applies a modern, translucent glass aesthetic — no complicated setups, layer tricks, or tedious adjustments. Just one click, and you’re set.


✨ Key Highlights:

  1. Instantly creates the iOS 26 liquid glass style
  2. Soft glowing glass with blur and shine


✨ How to use:

  1. Create rectangle outside any frames
  2. Apply plugin
  3. Edit corner radius
  4. Insert in your design


Ideal for UI kits, mobile app designs, or anywhere you want that clean Apple-style polish. Just select your layer and let the magic happen.
plugins.tagline: Liquid Glass Effect. Create rectangle, apply plugin and ust liquid glass in your design

140804.name: Real Liquid Glass
140804.description:
Bring that sleek iOS 26-style button glow into your Figma workflow with the Liquid Glass Effect plugin. It instantly applies a modern, translucent glass aesthetic — no complicated setups, layer tricks, or tedious adjustments. Just one click, and you’re set.

  2. Soft glowing glass with blur and shine


✨ How to use:

  1. Create rectangle outside any frames
  2. Apply plugin
  3. Edit corner radius
  4. Insert in your design


Ideal for UI kits, mobile app designs, or anywhere you want that clean Apple-style polish. Just select your layer and let the magic happen.
140804.release_notes: Removed Layer Blur from MAIN rectangle
140804.tagline: Liquid Glass Effect. Create rectangle, apply plugin and ust liquid glass in your design

plugins.name: Design System AI
plugins.description:
Design System AI는 디자인 시스템의 구조와 자동화 수준을 진단하고 시각화하는 Figma 플러그인입니다.


🎯 주요 기능

  1. 디자인 토큰, 컴포넌트, 자동화 상태 대시보드
  2. 중복 토큰 및 네이밍 불일치 탐지
  3. 토큰·컴포넌트 사용량 시각화
  4. 디자인 자동화율 측정


🛠️ 사용 방법

1️⃣ Select a Frame

🔲 프레임 하나를 선택하세요 (디자인 시스템이 적용된 화면 또는 컴포넌트 포함 프레임)

2️⃣ Run the Plugin

🚀 플러그인을 실행하면 자동으로 분석이 시작돼요

3️⃣ Check the Dashboard

📊 토큰 수, 컴포넌트 수, 자동화율, 사용률 차트를 확인하세요

4️⃣ Export CSV

📥 “Export CSV” 버튼을 눌러 토큰 리포트를 다운로드할 수 있어요


🗣️ 피드백 및 소통방법

카카오톡 오픈채팅방 입장하기 (가벼운 질문, 빠른 소통, 사용 팁 공유)

디스코드 서버 (심층적인 피드백, 기술 논의, 버그 리포트)


여러분의 많은 관심과 참여 부탁드립니다!



Design System AI is a Figma plugin that diagnoses and visualizes the structure and automation level of your design system.


🎯 Key Features

  1. Design Token, Component, and Automation Status Dashboard
  2. Duplicate Token & Naming Inconsistency Detection
  3. Token & Component Usage Visualization
  4. Design Automation Rate Measurement


🛠️ How to Use

1️⃣ Select a Frame

🔲 Choose a frame (a screen where your design system is applied, or a frame containing components)

2️⃣ Run the Plugin

🚀 The analysis starts automatically when you run the plugin!

3️⃣ Check the Dashboard

📊 View your token count, component count, automation rate, and usage charts.

4️⃣ Export CSV

📥 Click the "Export CSV" button to download your token report.


🗣️ Feedback & Communication

KakaoTalk Open Chat Room: (For light questions, quick communication, and usage tips)

Discord Server: (For in-depth feedback, technical discussions, and bug reports)


We appreciate your interest and participation!
plugins.tagline: 디자인 토큰부터 컴포넌트까지, 한눈에 진단

4️⃣ Export CSV

📥 “Export CSV” 버튼을 눌러 토큰 리포트를 다운로드할 수 있어요


🗣️ 피드백 및 소통방법

카카오톡 오픈채팅방 입장하기 (가벼운 질문, 빠른 소통, 사용 팁 공유)

여러분의 많은 관심과 참여 부탁드립니다!

plugins.name: Annotation Toolkit

Welcome to Annotation Toolkit!


This Figma plugin helps you easily add various annotations like


  1. cursors

to your designs. Most importantly, all elements are created within a single group, can be selected in one click, allowing for easy management and keeping your design files tidy!

plugins.name: Grid Forge - Create Tables using your Design System
plugins.description:
Grid Forge is a powerful Figma plugin that revolutionizes table creation by using your existing design system components. With intelligent auto layout, flexible width settings, and advanced data mapping, Grid Forge helps teams create responsive, consistent tables in seconds.


Use your own header and cell components, ensuring brand and Ul consistency. Configure columns with FIXED, HUG (with minimum width), or FILL modes, and instantly preview changes in

real-time.


Import data via CSV or Excel, map multiple fields per component, and watch as Grid Forge intelligently applies your design system to every table row saving time and maintaining design integrity across complex Uls like dashboards and forms.
plugins.tagline: Create responsive tables using your design system components, auto layout, and real data

137695.name: Grid Forge - Create Tables using your Design System
137695.description:
Grid Forge is a powerful Figma plugin that revolutionizes table creation by using your existing design system components. With intelligent auto layout, flexible width settings, and advanced data mapping, Grid Forge helps teams create responsive, consistent tables in seconds.


Use your own header and cell components, ensuring brand and Ul consistency. Configure columns with FIXED, HUG (with minimum width), or FILL modes, and instantly preview changes in

real-time.


Import data via CSV or Excel, map multiple fields per component, and watch as Grid Forge intelligently applies your design system to every table row saving time and maintaining design integrity across complex Uls like dashboards and forms.
137695.tagline: Create responsive tables using your design system components, auto layout, and real data

plugins.name: Fastr Exporter
plugins.description:
This plugin can convert a Figma file into a Fastr compatible format. This will generate a .zip file that you can import into Fastr Frontend platform. One quick import is all it takes to transform your Figma files into fully interactive experiences—brand components, fonts, and layouts intact. Get ready to edit, animate, and publish designs faster than ever before.


How to use the plug-in

If you have any issues when using the plugin, we recommend visiting our community article, which has a full guide and FAQs. For more information about the Fastr Frontend platform, please visit our website.


Reporting Issues

For any questions, please email support@getfastr.com and our team can assist further


License


This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

Copyright (c) KALEIDOS INC

plugins.tagline: Seamlessly Bring Your Figma Designs into Fastr Frontend

137378.name: Fastr Exporter
137378.description:
This plugin can convert a Figma file into a Fastr compatible format. This will generate a .zip file that you can import into Fastr Frontend platform. One quick import is all it takes to transform your Figma files into fully interactive experiences—brand components, fonts, and layouts intact. Get ready to edit, animate, and publish designs faster than ever before.


How to use the plug-in

If you have any issues when using the plugin, we recommend visiting our community article, which has a full guide and FAQs. For more information about the Fastr Frontend platform, please visit our website.


Reporting Issues

For any questions, please email support@getfastr.com and our team can assist further


License


This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

Copyright (c) KALEIDOS INC

plugins.name: Color Variable Binder
plugins.description:
1. Suitable for copying layer fill, stroke variables, and color style with the same name replacement.

2. Suitable for replacing the same named solid color variable for copying layer effects.

3. The copied color style is internally bound to the same named solid color and gradient color variables, as well as the color variables within the gradient color.


1.适用于复制图层fill、stroke的变量、color style同名替换。

2.适用于复制图层effects的同名纯色变量替换。

3.复制的color style内部绑定同名纯色、渐变色变量，渐变色内部的颜色变量。

plugins.name: Reorder Nested Instances Tool
plugins.description:
Reorder Nested Instances lets you reorder nested instances inside any Figma component instance. No detaching.


To undo a reorder, you can:

* Select the canvas and use 'Undo' (Cmd+Z / Ctrl+Z).

* Restore your file using Version History (before the plugin was applied).


Note: Support for persisting style overrides is actively being worked on - Please support this plugins development by providing feedback on the form found here.
plugins.tagline: Reorder nested instances with ease!

137207.name: Reorder Nested Instances Tool
137207.description:

To undo a reorder, you can:

* Select the canvas and use 'Undo' (Cmd+Z / Ctrl+Z).

* Restore your file using Version History (before the plugin was applied).


Note: Support for persisting style overrides is actively being worked on - Please support this plugins development by providing feedback on the form found here.

plugins.name: UX Buddy
plugins.description:
Transform your design process with instant, expert-level UX feedback.


UX Buddy is your personal design critic that never sleeps. This powerful Figma plugin analyzes your frames and provides instant, actionable feedback based on proven UX principles and industry best practices.


What UX Buddy Does:

✨ **Instant UX Analysis** - Get comprehensive design feedback in seconds, not hours

🎯 **Actionable Insights** - Receive specific, implementable recommendations to improve your designs

🎨 **Visual Design Review** - Analyze color usage, typography, spacing, and visual hierarchy

📱 **Accessibility Checks** - Ensure your designs meet accessibility standards and guidelines

🚀 **Workflow Integration** - Seamlessly integrates into your existing Figma workflow


Key Features:

- **Smart Color Analysis** - Detect contrast issues and color harmony problems

- **Typography Review** - Identify font pairing, hierarchy, and readability issues

- **Layout Evaluation** - Analyze spacing, alignment, and visual balance

- **UX Best Practices** - Get feedback based on established design principles

- **Detailed Reports** - Receive comprehensive analysis with prioritized recommendations

- **Real-time Feedback** - Instant analysis as you design


Perfect For:

- **Product Designers** looking to validate their design decisions

- **UX/UI Designers** wanting to ensure best practices

- **Design Teams** seeking consistent quality standards

- **Freelancers** who need expert-level feedback

- **Students** learning design principles


How It Works:

1. Select any frame in your Figma file

2. Click the UX Buddy plugin

3. Get instant, expert-level analysis

4. Implement suggested improvements

5. Create better user experiences


**Professional-grade analysis** - Providing comprehensive design critique and UX insights based on industry standards and proven methodologies.


Stop guessing about your design decisions. Let UX Buddy guide you toward creating exceptional user experiences that delight and convert.

accepted.name: Opeyemi Ajagbe
accepted.description: I craft digital products that empower people and drive business growth.

plugins.tagline: Expert UX analysis that makes your designs better, instantly.

plugins.name: figma to testcase
plugins.description: Transform your Figma designs into comprehensive test cases with just a few clicks. This powerful plugin analyzes your UI elements and generates detailed test scenarios for functional, security, accessibility, and performance testing. Export your test cases directly to TestRail or Zephyr in CSV format, maintaining exact UI text and interactions. Perfect for designers, developers, and QA teams looking to streamline their testing workflow and ensure product quality.

plugins.name: Design Roaster
plugins.description:
Design Analyzer & Enhancer is your intelligent Figma assistant, designed to help you elevate your designs to the next level. With a single click, this plugin scans your entire Figma file, analyses your current design, and delivers a comprehensive review—including pros, cons, and actionable recommendations for improvement.

But that’s not all: inspired by your existing work, Design Analyzer & Enhancer also proposes an enhanced design concept, offering you a creative starting point for your next iteration. Whether you’re seeking a quick design audit or looking for fresh inspiration, this plugin empowers designers of all levels to create more polished, user-friendly, and visually compelling interfaces.

Key Features

• Automated Design Analysis: Instantly review your design’s strengths and areas for improvement.

• Actionable Recommendations: Get practical tips and suggestions tailored to your specific design.

• Proposed Enhanced Designs: Explore new design directions generated based on your current work.

• Easy to Use: One-click operation, no complex setup required.

• Boost Your Creativity: Use AI-powered insights to inspire your next great design.

• Transform your workflow, catch overlooked issues, and get inspired—all without leaving Figma.
plugins.tagline: Designer's companion for better UX/UI by ABA Bank

136990.description:

plugins.name: QuickData
plugins.description:
Easily sync your Figma layers with data from a public Google Sheet. Perfect for batch renaming or inserting text into layers based on column headers.


✅ 1. Prepare Your Google Sheet

Set it to public:

File → Share → Anyone with the link


Make sure the first row contains column headers


For best results, freeze the header row


⚙️ 2. In the Plugin

Paste your Google Sheet URL


Preview your data in a table


Use the refresh button to reload updated data


🧩 3. Setup Layers

Name your layers using: #ColumnName

e.g., For a "Name" column → #Name


Spaces & special characters are auto-removed


🔁 4. Sync Your Data

Select the layers you want to update


Click the “Sync” button


🖊️ Text layers: name & content will update


🧱 Other layers: only name updates


🙌 Support Me

If you found this plugin helpful, consider supporting me:

👉 https://jdip19.github.io/support-jdip.html


💬 Have Feedback or Ideas?

📧 Contact me: ujaydip9@gmail.com


🔗 Follow me on LinkedIn for UI/UX & plugin design updates:

linkedin.com/in/jaydip-upadhyay-32b231176
plugins.tagline: Auto-fill & rename text layers from Google Sheets

137348.name: QuickData
137348.description:
Easily sync your Figma layers with data from a public Google Sheet. Perfect for batch renaming or inserting text into layers based on column headers.


✅ 1. Prepare Your Google Sheet

Set it to public:

File → Share → Anyone with the link


Make sure the first row contains column headers


For best results, freeze the header row


⚙️ 2. In the Plugin

Paste your Google Sheet URL


Preview your data in a table


Use the refresh button to reload updated data


🧩 3. Setup Layers

Name your layers using: #ColumnName

e.g., For a "Name" column → #Name


Spaces & special characters are auto-removed


🔁 4. Sync Your Data

Select the layers you want to update


Click the “Sync” button


🖊️ Text layers: name & content will update


🧱 Other layers: only name updates


🙌 Support Me

If you found this plugin helpful, consider supporting me:

👉 https://jdip19.github.io/support-jdip.html


💬 Have Feedback or Ideas?

📧 Contact me: ujaydip9@gmail.com


🔗 Follow me on LinkedIn for UI/UX & plugin design updates:

linkedin.com/in/jaydip-upadhyay-32b231176
137348.release_notes:
## Version 2.0.0 (June 2025)

### Major Changes
- **Streamlined Data Syncing**
  - Simplified the core functionality to focus on direct Google Sheets integration
  - Improved data normalization for sheets with or without frozen headers
  - Enhanced error handling for invalid URLs and data formats

### UI Improvements
- **Tea Cup Animation**
  - Added animated steam effects with three particles
  - Implemented hover animations for the "Buy me tea" link
  - Refined positioning and styling of the tea cup SVG
  - Modified steam animation timing and positions

- **Instructions Modal**
  - Reorganized the "How to use" modal content for better clarity
  - Added clearer sections for:
    - Sheet preparation
    - Plugin usage
    - Layer syncing
  - Included tips about header rows and preview functionality

### Technical Improvements
- **Code Optimization**
  - Removed unused interfaces and functions for better maintainability
  - Streamlined the core data syncing logic
  - Improved error message handling
  - Enhanced logging for better debugging

### User Experience
- **Better Feedback**
  - Added clear success messages with layer count details
  - Improved error notifications with specific failure reasons
  - Added loading states during data fetch operations

### Documentation
- **Plugin Description**
  - Updated cover image text: "Instantly sync your Google Sheets data with Figma layers for seamless content updates"
  - Enhanced usage instructions and examples
137348.tagline: Auto-fill & rename text layers from Google Sheets

plugins.name: 핸드오프러브
plugins.description:
이제, 당신의 핸드오프에도 로맨스가 필요할 때.

나만의 발자님을 위한 사랑스러운 디자이너가 되어보세요



OVERVIEW

디자인 수정을 요청할 때, 핸드오프 문서를 전달할 때, QA를 진행할 때...

디자이너와 발자님과의 관계는 항상 위태롭습니다.

서로의 언어가 달라서 오해가 생길 때,

‘핸드오프러브’로 사랑이 담긴 핸드오프 러브레터를 보내보세요!


HOW IT WORKS

발자님께 전할 내용을 입력하고 발자님의 언어를 선택하기만 하면,

사랑스러운 핸드오프 내용으로 변환되어 내 피그마에 러브레터가 첨부됩니다.


FEATURES


1. 8개 이상의 개발 언어를 연인 스타일로 지원

Python부터 Java, JS, SQL, Go, TypeScript, C++, 그리고 Android 개발자를 위한 Kotlin 언어를 지원하며 각 언어에 특화된 말투와 이미지가 지원됩니다.


2. 사랑이 담긴 고급 프롬프트 패턴 엔진

수개월 간 직접 설계한 각 언어 별 프롬프트 패턴이 적용되어 있으며, 수많은 연애 경험을 살려 고안한 실전 문장으로 변환됩니다.


3. 디자이너 취향저격 러브레터 디자인

문장 입력만으로 사랑가득한 러브레터 카드가 자동 생성되며 텍스트 수정도 가능합니다.


4. 복사 버튼으로 슬랙/노션에 바로 붙여넣기

핸드오프가 메모처럼 가볍고 예뻐지는 순간을 경험해보세요


5. 발자님과의 갈등을 없애는 최적의 팀워크 도구

단순 문장을 사랑스럽게 바꾸는 것을 넘어 실제 개발자들이 디자이너의 말을 오해 없이 받아들이고, 더 나아가 사랑이 시작될지도...


6. “말 때문에 생기는 오해”를 구조적으로 해결

오빠, input()만 해주면 돼. 나머진 이 플러그인이 알아서 해줄 거야.


문의할 내용이 있다면,

doingseo0906@gmail.com으로 언제든지 연락주세요 :>
plugins.tagline: 이제, 당신의 핸드오프에도 로맨스가 필요할 때.

4. 복사 버튼으로 슬랙/노션에 바로 붙여넣기

핸드오프가 메모처럼 가볍고 예뻐지는 순간을 경험해보세요


5. 발자님과의 갈등을 없애는 최적의 팀워크 도구

단순 문장을 사랑스럽게 바꾸는 것을 넘어 실제 개발자들이 디자이너의 말을 오해 없이 받아들이고, 더 나아가 사랑이 시작될지도...


6. “말 때문에 생기는 오해”를 구조적으로 해결

오빠, input()만 해주면 돼. 나머진 이 플러그인이 알아서 해줄 거야.


문의할 내용이 있다면,

doingseo0906@gmail.com으로 언제든지 연락주세요 :>

plugins.name: Bulk Certificate Generator / Generador Masivo de Certificados
plugins.description:
How does this plugin work?


Users can automate the creation of personalized certificates inside Figma, avoiding the manual copy-pasting of required data.



Step-by-step: How to use the plugin


1 - Create the base design in Figma

  1. Design a certificate inside a Frame or Component.
  2. Use text layers named like #NAME, #COURSE, #DATE, etc.
  3. These names will be automatically replaced with data from the Sheet.


2 – Prepare the Google Sheet

  1. Create a public Google Sheet.
  2. In the first row, write the field names: NAME, COURSE, DATE, ID, etc.
  3. Fill the rows with each person’s data.
  4. Make sure the document is public (set to “Anyone with the link can view”).


3 – Select your design in Figma

  1. Select the Frame or Component containing your base design.
  2. Only one selection is allowed when running the plugin.


4 – Open the plugin

  1. Run the plugin from the Figma menu.
  2. Paste the Google Sheet link.
  3. Enter the sheet name (e.g., Students).
  4. Toggle the “Show ID” option on or off if you want to hide it.


5 – Preview (optional)

  1. Click “Preview” to generate just one sample certificate.


6 – Generate certificates

  1. Click “Generate.”
  2. The plugin will clone your base design, replace the fields, and automatically arrange the certificates on the Figma page.


7 - Have fun!
plugins.tagline: Diseñá uno, generá cientos. Certificados personalizados en Figma desde un Google Sheet.

139581.name: Bulk Certificate Generator / Generador Masivo de Certificados
139581.description:

  4. Toggle the “Show ID” option on or off if you want to hide it.


5 – Preview (optional)

  1. Click “Preview” to generate just one sample certificate.


6 – Generate certificates

  1. Click “Generate.”
  2. The plugin will clone your base design, replace the fields, and automatically arrange the certificates on the Figma page.


7 - Have fun!
139581.tagline: Diseñá uno, generá cientos. Certificados personalizados en Figma desde un Google Sheet.

plugins.name: Lingo
plugins.description:
Lingo helps designers and design teams scale products across multiple markets faster by streamlining localization. Effortlessly translate your designs into multiple languages — we handle conversion so you can focus on adaptation.


How to use:


  1. Open the plugin
  2. Select entire frame/specific section with content to be translated
  3. Select preferred language and translate.


Use cases:


Lingo will be useful for you or you team if you:


  1. Operate in multiple markets – Whether you're launching globally or scaling your existing products across regions, Lingo ensures seamless translation and localization.
  2. Need fast, high-quality translations – Quickly adapt marketing materials, product descriptions, and support docs without sacrificing accuracy.
  3. Work with visual content – Effortlessly translate social media graphics, posters, infographics, ads, and blog visuals while preserving design integrity.
  4. Manage multilingual blogs and articles – Localize blog posts, newsletters, and landing pages while maintaining SEO optimization.
  5. Run international ad campaigns – Adapt ad copy, video subtitles, and CTAs for different audiences with culturally relevant messaging.
  6. Collaborate with global teams – Streamline workflows by enabling real-time translation for internal documents, presentations, and training materials.
  7. Support customer experience (CX) – Provide multilingual customer service content, FAQs, and chatbots for better engagement.


Lingo helps you break language barriers efficiently, so you can focus on adaptation and growth, not conversion.


We'd love to hear from you!❤️

How are you using Lingo? What’s working well, and what could be even better? Your feedback helps us improve and serve you best—so don’t hesitate to share your thoughts, wishes, or even tiny frustrations.


Drop us a note at ajaoabdulsamad2000@gmail.com.

accepted.name: Kolade
accepted.description: Product designer - Impacting lives and businesses through elegant and delightful digital experiences

plugins.tagline: Reach every market!

plugins.name: SheetSync For DeSo
plugins.description:
SheetSync For DeSo: Spreadsheets to Figma Design Variations


Tired of manual data entry in Figma? SheetSync For DeSo revolutionizes your workflow by letting you populate design frames directly from your data sources.

Effortlessly generate multiple design variations, product cards, user profiles, and more by connecting to:

  1. Google Sheets (Public Links)
  2. Local CSV/XLSX Files

Rename your Figma text and image layers to match your spreadsheet headers (e.g., #product_name, #image_url), select your template frame, and let SheetSync do the rest! It even includes robust image fetching with retry options.
plugins.tagline: Design at Scale, Sheet to Shape

140513.name: SheetSync For DeSo
140513.description:
SheetSync For DeSo: Spreadsheets to Figma Design Variations


Tired of manual data entry in Figma? SheetSync For DeSo revolutionizes your workflow by letting you populate design frames directly from your data sources.

  1. Google Sheets (Public Links)
  2. Local CSV/XLSX Files

Rename your Figma text and image layers to match your spreadsheet headers (e.g., #product_name, #image_url), select your template frame, and let SheetSync do the rest! It even includes robust image fetching with retry options.
140513.release_notes: Updated image fetching error for multiple images.
140513.tagline: Design at Scale, Sheet to Shape

This plugin just inserts today's date into a text property.

plugins.name: Refine Selection
plugins.description:
Refine Selection: Smart Layer Filtering for Figma


Transform your selection workflow with this powerful tool that helps you select and deselect layers with precision. Perfect for designers who work with complex designs and need quick access to specific layer types.


Key Features:

• One-Click Selection: Instantly select all layers of a specific type within your current selection

• Alt+Click to Deselect: Hold Alt (or Option) to deselect layers instead of selecting them

• Smart Layer Detection: Automatically identifies and filters:

- Text layers

- All shapes

- Primitives (stars, polygons, lines, rectangles, ellipses)

- Paths

- Lines

- Image layers

- Frame layers

- Components

- Instances


Workflow Benefits:

• Save Time: No more manual selection of multiple layers

• Reduce Errors: Precise selection of specific layer types

• Smart UI: Buttons automatically disable when no matching layers are found

• Intuitive Design: Clean interface with visual feedback


Perfect For:

Designers working with complex layouts

Teams managing large design systems

Anyone who needs to quickly select specific layer types

Designers who frequently work with nested components


💡 Pro Tip: Hold Alt (or Option) while clicking to deselect layers instead of selecting them!


Note: Free version includes rate limiting of 50 selection per minute. Subscribe to remove limitations and support future development.
plugins.tagline: Refine Selection: Smart Layer Filtering for Figma

plugins.name: SP Grid Table Generator
plugins.description: Quickly generate editable AG Grid-style tables in Figma. Customize column headers and input row data before generating a clean, structured table—complete with filter icons, dividers, and consistent styling. Perfect for dashboards, admin panels, and data-heavy UI mockups.

plugins.name: ColorGen AI
plugins.description: ColorGen AI is a powerful tool for generating custom color palettes. Users can input colors using hex codes, adjust HSL values, or use the color picker tool to pick the color from your design. The platform simplifies color selection, making it easy to explore and refine shades for design projects. Click on any color to copy its hex code effortlessly.
plugins.tagline: Unlock the Magic of Colors – Create, Explore, and Design with Confidence!

128892.name: ColorGen AI
128892.description: ColorGen AI is a powerful tool for generating custom color palettes. Users can input colors using hex codes, adjust HSL values, or use the color picker tool to pick the color from your design. The platform simplifies color selection, making it easy to explore and refine shades for design projects. Click on any color to copy its hex code effortlessly.
128892.tagline: Unlock the Magic of Colors – Create, Explore, and Design with Confidence!

plugins.name: Boxy
plugins.description: Boxy is a simple Figma plugin that makes layout properties easy to see. It overlays visual indicators for padding, element sizes, and autolayouts gaps between components—perfect for quickly checking your work or handing off accurate specs to developers.
plugins.tagline: See spacing clearly. Visualize padding, gaps, and element dimensions directly in your Figma designs.

plugins.name: Export Children 1Click
plugins.description:
Export Children 1Click helps you instantly export all Frame layers inside any container (Section, Frame, or Group) as individual image files.


⚡ Features:

•Export all child frames with one click

•Works with Sections, Frames, Groups

•No UI, no configuration needed — just select and run

•Automatically names each image by frame name

•Extremely fast and memory-safe


💡 Ideal for handoff, documentation, or asset slicing.


Created with ❤️ by Giang Nguyen
plugins.tagline: Export all frames inside any container in one click.

plugins.name: Offgrid.fm
plugins.description:
Offgrid.fm is a lightweight Figma plugin that quietly monitors your design canvas and alerts you when someone is viewing your work without interacting. Whether you're collaborating on sensitive projects or just want more visibility into your workspace and helps you stay in control.


Key Features:

  1. Real-time detection of inactive observers
  2. Instantly identifies who's viewing your designs
  3. Helps protect your creative privacy and intellectual property
  4. Runs silently in the background without disrupting your workflow


Currently supports the Figma Web App only. *


Ideal for designers handling confidential work, remote teams, and creatives who value situational awareness in collaborative environments.
plugins.tagline: You've got eyes on you 👀

129513.name: Offgrid.fm
129513.description:

plugins.name: FileFlow
plugins.description:
FileFlow helps you instantly create organized file structures in Figma with predefined workflows for different project types.

Create consistent, well-structured Figma files without the tedious manual work. With FileFlow, you can:


Choose from pre-built templates for different workflows (Research, UI Design, Webflow, Product, Agency, and more)

  1. Create custom page hierarchies with intuitive organization
  2. Add sections and dividers to group related pages
  3. Use emoji icons to visually distinguish different page types
  4. Save time on project setup with one-click implementation


Perfect for teams that want to standardize their Figma file organization or individuals looking to streamline their workflow. FileFlow makes it easy to maintain clean, professional file structures that improve collaboration and productivity.


Tags

organization, workflow, file structure, pages, productivity, project management, templates, file setup

These details have been optimized for searchability while accurately describing what your plugin does. The description highlights key benefits and features that would appeal to Figma users looking for organization solutions. I've also included relevant tags that potential users might search for when looking for plugins like yours.
plugins.tagline: Organize your Figma files with custom page structures and workflows in one click
